com.atakmap.android.maps

Interface MapComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMapComponent, AbstractWidgetMapComponent, AdditionalCFFMapComponent, ApkUpdateComponent, BloodHoundMapComponent, BrightnessComponent, ChannelsMapComponent, ChatManagerMapComponent, CommsMapComponent, CompassArrowMapComponent, CompassRingMapComponent, CoordOverlayMapComponent, CoTInfoMapComponent, CotMapComponent, DangerCloseMapComponent, DataMgmtMapComponent, DrawingToolsMapComponent, DropDownManagerMapComponent, DropDownMapComponent, ElevationMapComponent, ElevationOverlaysMapComponent, EmergencyAlertComponent, EmergencyLifecycleListener, FiresMapComponent, FirstPersonMapComponent, FreeLookMapComponent, GeoFenceComponent, GeopackageMapComponent, GLMapComponent, GLWidgetsMapComponent, GRGMapComponent, GridLinesMapComponent, HashtagMapComponent, HierarchyMapComponent, HostileManagerMapComponent, IconsMapComponent, ImageMapComponent, ImportExportMapComponent, JumpBridgeMapComponent, LayersMapComponent, LoadoutListMapComponent, LoadoutToolsMapComponent, LocationMapComponent, LRFMapComponent, MapCoreIntentsComponent, MapItemListComponent, MapOverlayComponent, MedicalLineMapComponent, MenuMapComponent, MetricReportMapComponent, MissionPackageMapComponent, ModelMapComponent, MultiplePairingLineMapComponent, NativeRenderingMapComponent, NavWidgetsMapComponent, NightVisionMapWidgetComponent, OffScreenIndicatorsMapComponent, PairingLineMapComponent, PluginMapComponent, QuickPicMapComponent, RadioMapComponent, RangeAndBearingMapComponent, ResectionMapComponent, RouteMapComponent, RubberSheetMapComponent, StateSaver, TargetBubbleMapComponent, TilesetMapComponent, ToolbarMapComponent, TrackHistoryComponent, UserMapComponent, VehicleMapComponent, VideoMapComponent, ViewshedMapComponent, VisibilityMapComponent, WarningComponent, WarningMapComponent, WFSMapComponent, WktMapComponent

    public interface MapComponent
    Engine feature-set or major component

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConfigurationChanged(android.content.res.Configuration newConfiguration)
      Implementation of onConfigurationChanged used to handle configuration changes for each mapComponent.

      Called when the component is first created
      boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(android.content.Context context, android.view.Menu menu)
      Is called on all Map Components when the onCreateOptionsMenu is called on the Map Activity.

      Called when the component must be destroyed

      Called on a onOptionsItemSelected is called and not found in regular activity.

      Option menu has been closed in MapActivity.

      Implementation for an abstract map component which corresponds to the onPause state transition.

      Called to Update the Options Menu on all MapComponents in the MapActivity.

      Implementation for an abstract map component which corresponds to the onResume state transition.

      Implementation for an abstract map component which corresponds to the onStart state transition.

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(android.content.Context context,
                            android.view.Menu menu)
        Is called on all Map Components when the onCreateOptionsMenu is called on the Map Activity.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the component (the MapActivity instance)
        menu - The options menu in which you place your items.
        Returns:
        true if there is something to show
        See Also:
        Activity.onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu)

      • onPrepareOptionsMenu

        boolean onPrepareOptionsMenu(android.content.Context context,
                             android.view.Menu menu)
        Called to Update the Options Menu on all MapComponents in the MapActivity.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the component (the MapActivity instance)
        menu - The options menu in which you place your items.
        Returns:
        true if there is something to show

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.content.Context context,
                              android.view.MenuItem item)
        Called on a onOptionsItemSelected is called and not found in regular activity.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the component (the MapActivity instance)
        item - The menu item that was selected.
        Returns:
        true if mapcomponent consumes/uses the activity
        See Also:
        Activity.onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem)

      • onOptionsMenuClosed

        void onOptionsMenuClosed(android.content.Context context,

        menu - The options menu in which you place your items.
